title: ‘It’s Only Her First Race’: Road Comeback Begins with a Reality Check for Pauline Ferrand-Prévot
content:
UAE Tour serves as wakeup call for Ferrand-Prévot on how much road racing's evolved: 'I know it will take time to adapt.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s Only Her First Race’: Road Comeback Begins with a Reality Check for Pauline Ferrand-Prévot on Velo.
author: ahood
